executable.title: ComputeCSFVolume
executable.description: Compute The EA-CSF Volume For the left or the right hemisphere from a binary image (CSF probability image). Indeed this image is multiplied by the visitation map to remove lateral ventricule CSF from it. then the volume is computed using the image result of this multiplication

file.name: VisitationMap
file.description: A binary image in nrrd format wich contains all the voxels visited during the compuatation of EA-CSF. This image is generated during the process of LocalEACSF computation

file.name: CSFProbabiltyMap
file.description: CSF Proabability Map a nrrd file wich gives the probability of CSF at each voxel

file.name: CSFDenistytxtfile
file.description: Txt file where to write the volume value

string.name: Label
string.description: Case ID for example (to differenciate cases from each other)
